DOC.HEADLINE: THE WEEK AHEAD : LONDON ; ANTI-NAZIS TO RALLY
DOC.TEXT: Britain ' s Anti-Nazi League will hold a Carnival Against the Nazis in South London on Saturday to highlight what it calls an alarming rise of the political far-right in Europe.Rock bands will provide an enticement to newcomers . The Anti-Nazi League was revived in 1992 when its adherents , including many members_of_Parliament , saw the emerging strength of neo-fascist parties in Europe . Many of these parties are running candidates in the June 9 election to the European Parliament .
